title: AE60052: Aircraft Fuel Systems - Quick Facts
text:

Credits | 3

Previous Year Grade Distribution

Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE60007 Fuel performance in engines; combustion efficiency: effects of altitude, fuel volatility, injection and molecular structures of fuel on combustion efficiency; Altitude operational limits; Carbon deposits, smoking, Starting performance, ignition characteristics; Fuel behavior in aircraft fuel systems, fuel specification and availability, potential low cost fuels, residual fuels for gas turbine applications.
